services/manned-guarding
The First Line of Defense. Our manned guarding solutions provide a 
visible, professional deterrent against threats. We do not offer a "one 
size fits all" guard; we provide customized security professionals 
tailored to the specific environment they protect. Our operations are 
fully compliant with the Private Security Agencies Regulation Act 
(PSARA) 2005, and our infrastructure includes over 47 training centers 
that ensure every guard meets exacting standards.
Sector-Specific Solutions:
Corporate & Commercial: Professional, uniformed guards for office 
buildings, banks, and corporate parks who manage access and 
represent your brand image.
Industrial & Factory: Rugged security solutions for factories and 
industrial complexes, focusing on material gate passes, theft 
prevention, and labor safety.
Residential & Housing Societies: Vigilant gate management and 
patrol services that ensure the safety of families and residents.
Hospitality & Lifestyle: Bouncers and security staff for clubs, 
restaurants, and hotels who are trained in soft skills and crowd 
management.
The FirstGlobal Guard Profile: Every deployed resource is a minimum 
matriculate with 12 to 18 months of relevant experience. They are 
physically fit, mentally alert, and fluent in Hindi or the local language 
for effective communication. Each guard comes fully equipped with a 
complete uniform, tactical torch, baton, and communication devices 
to handle any situation.Escort Guarding
Safety in Motion. Transporting high-value assets or ensuring the safe 
commute of personnel requires more than just a driver. Our escort 
guarding services provide mobile protection you can trust for 
logistics, cash-in-transit, or employee transport vehicles.
Key Features:
Route Risk Management: We analyze travel routes beforehand to 
identify potential chokepoints or danger zones.
Real-Time Tracking: Integration with GPS systems to monitor 
vehicle location and status continuously.
Defensive Protocols: Personnel are trained in defensive positioning 
to protect the asset or passenger in the event of a roadway 
incident or attempted interception.Event Protection
Seamless Security for Memorable Moments. From corporate summits 
(AGMs) to large-scale public gatherings and concerts, successful 
events require invisible yet effective security. FirstGlobal manages the 
entire safety ecosystem, allowing you to focus on the experience 
while we handle the contingencies.
Our Approach:
Crowd Dynamics: Expert handling of large volumes of people to 
prevent stampedes or bottlenecks.
VIP Access Control: Dedicated zones and protection for celebrities, 
speakers, and senior management.
Emergency Response: Pre-planned exit strategies and medical 
evacuation routes coordinated with local law enforcement.Executive Securit y
Discreet Protection for Global Leaders. Our Personal Security Officers 
(PSOs) provide elite protection for high-profile individuals and 
corporate executives. These are not just bodyguards; they are highly 
disciplined professionals trained to blend in while remaining hyper-
alert.
Service Highlights:
Threat Assessment: We conduct thorough risk analysis of the 
principal ' s routine and travel plans.
Etiquette & Discretion: Our PSOs are trained in corporate etiquette, 
ensuring they are unobtrusive during meetings and social 
engagements.
Rapid Response: Immediate physical intervention capabilities to 
neutralize threats and evacuate the principal to safety.Security Training
Forging the Standard of Excellence. Security is a skill that demands 
constant refinement. Our dedicated training division is the engine 
behind our q uality. We upskill personnel in modern threat detection, 
legal compliance, and crisis management.
Curriculum Includes:
Fire Safety & First Aid: Every guard is a first responder capable of 
handling basic medical and fire emergencies.
Legal Awareness: Training on the legal rights of a security officer 
and the laws of the land.
Behavioral Skills: Drills on conflict de-escalation to resolve disputes 
without violence.Travel Security Suppor t
Global Mobility, Managed. With operations spanning India, the U AE, 
and Finland, we understand global travel risks. Our travel security 
support offers risk intelligence, itinerary management, and on-ground 
support, ensuring your team is safe, informed, and connected.
Scope of Support:
Airport Transfers: Secure meet-and-greet services to ensure safe 
passage from arrival to accommodation.
Risk Intelligence: Pre-travel briefings on local political stability, 
health risks, and cultural sensitivities.
Geo-Fencing: Digital tracking solutions that alert our command 
center if a traveler deviates from the safe zone.Railways Gate Security Managemen t
Critical Infrastructure Protection. Securing the lifelines of transport 
requires specialized attention. We manage railway gate security with 
a focus on logistics flow, unauthorized access prevention, and 
signaling coordination.
Operational Focus:
Asset Protection: Preventing theft of signaling equipment, copper 
wiring, and track infrastructure.
Access Control: strict regulation of movement at level crossings 
and maintenance yards.
Logistics Flow: ensuring that cargo movement is documented and 
tamper-proof.Security Services:
U ncompromising Protection for a Complex World. At FirstGlobal, we redefine security by combining traditional vigilance with modern strategy. As a global leader in integrated security, our security personnel are not just guards; they are highly trained assets dedicated to ethics, integrity, and your absolute safety. We operate with a massive, disciplined force of over 3 5,000 personnel, ensuring that no matter the scale of your requirement, we have the bandwidth to deliver.
